author: franzoni
body:
- fix the selection of wf 134 (from included-in-string to equal-to-integer) which is HARV of Alca [affects only local running like in IB's]
- remove SiteWhitelist (per computing's request) [affects only workflow submission]

I am assuming that this PR will be considered also for 71x
title: HARVESTING input for some postLS1 wfs + remove whitelisting
